title: Handshake  · Angelo State University
description: Access Angelo State University’s Handshake career portal to connect with employers, search for internships, and manage your job search.

paragraphs: The #1 way college students find jobs.
Join today and get recruited by the top employers for full-time, part-time jobs and internships—little to no experience required.
Recent graduates and alumni can register for access to Handshake. After you create your account, Angelo State staff will verify if you are a Angelo State graduate and approve your account.
Interested in recruiting at Angelo State University? Contact us to post your job listings.
We make every effort to vet opportunities but cannot fully guarantee the authenticity or legitimacy of the positions that are posted.

Angelo State University makes no representation or guarantee about positions listed by the Center for Career and Professional Success. The Center for Career and Professional Success is not responsible for safety, wages, working conditions or other aspects of on- or off-campus employment. The Center for Career and Professional Success does not guarantee that all jobs listed are still available. It is the responsibility of individuals to research the integrity of the organizations to which they are applying. Our office advises students to use caution and common sense when applying for any position with an organization or a private party. You should not go alone to a residential address to apply for a job. Do not put yourself in a vulnerable position. Even the best job opportunity is not worth jeopardizing your personal safety. This website also contains links to other websites not under the control of the Center for Career and Professional Success and we are not responsible for the contents of any linked site. The Center for Career and Professional Success provides these links only as a convenience. ASU and the Center for Career and Professional Success assume no liability for acts of omission by third parties or for material supplied by them.

The job posting site is for the benefit of Angelo State University students. The Center for Career and Professional Success of ASU reserves the right to deny an advertiser who’s posting, in the judgment of this office, is not in the students’ best interest. Such denial is done without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin or conditions of disability.
